subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Bode Miller handily won the first part of Thursday’s super combined. But Aksel Lund Svindal, a 23-year-old star of the World Cup circuit, won the super combined in 2 minutes 6.74 seconds.
snippet: Bode Miller handily won the first part of Thursday’s super combined. But Aksel Lund Svindal, a 23-year-old star of the World Cup circuit, won the super combined in 2 minutes 6.74 seconds.
